cmp: 子 (11 p.m.-1 a.m./1st earthly branch/child/midnight/son/child/seed/egg/small thing, (noun suff.))
mng: membrane lining inside a cylindrical stem, culm
used for 殍 piǎo, to die of starvation

exm.mng: used for 殍 piǎo, to die of starvation
membrane lining inside a cylindrical stem, culm
starving people everywhere (idiom); a state of famine
